com.inmobi.androidsdk
Interface IMAdInterstitialListener

public interface IMAdInterstitialListener

The listener interface for receiving notifications from IMAdInterstitial about the interstitial ad status.

Method Summary
 void onAdRequestFailed(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial, IMAdRequest.ErrorCode errorCode)
          Called from IMAdInterstitial when it has failed to load an ad.
 void onAdRequestLoaded(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
          Called from IMAdInterstitial when it has successfully loaded an ad.
 void onDismissAdScreen(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
          Called from IMAdInterstitial when an interstitial ad gets closed.
 void onShowAdScreen(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
          Called from IMAdInterstitial when an interstitial ad is show on top of the screen.
 

Method Detail

onAdRequestFailed

void onAdRequestFailed(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial,
                       IMAdRequest.ErrorCode errorCode)
Called from IMAdInterstitial when it has failed to load an ad.

Parameters:
adInterstitial - The IMAdInterstitial which has failed to load.
errorCode - The ErrorCode which specifies the reason for failing.

onAdRequestLoaded

void onAdRequestLoaded(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
Called from IMAdInterstitial when it has successfully loaded an ad. Ideally, on receiving this notfication, the interstitial ad is ready to be shown.

Parameters:
adInterstitial - The IMAdInterstitial which has loaded an ad.

onShowAdScreen

void onShowAdScreen(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
Called from IMAdInterstitial when an interstitial ad is show on top of the screen. The application has to suspend itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
adInterstitial - The IMAdInterstitial which has loaded an ad.

onDismissAdScreen

void onDismissAdScreen(IMAdInterstitial adInterstitial)
Called from IMAdInterstitial when an interstitial ad gets closed. The application has to resume itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
adInterstitial - The IMAdInterstitial which has loaded an ad.
